steps.description: System sends renewal reminder via email and/or SMS and pushes an inâ€‘app notification; UTM and campaign attribution recorded; reminder contains renewal summary and CTA to review policy.
steps.businessRationale: Notifications must be delivered quickly and reliably; timely reminders drive renewal engagement and reduce churn. Delays reduce open rates and downstream renewals.

steps.description: Customer clicks reminder CTA, lands on secure portal, authenticates via password or one-time code; session established and policy context loaded for renewal review.
steps.businessRationale: Low friction authentication preserves conversion; excessive friction or failures increase abandonment of the renewal flow and reduce retained premium.

steps.description: Customer reviews current cover (Buildings, Contents, Combined), checks sums insured, optional add-ons, and recent claims history; system highlights recommended changes and cross-sell offers.
steps.businessRationale: Customers typically spend several minutes reviewing cover and options; clear UI and fast data retrieval increase acceptance of recommended adjustments and add-ons, raising average premium.

steps.description: Underwriting engine recalculates renewal premium based on updated risk factors, discounts, loyalty pricing, and third-party data (property risk, flood data); alternative offers generated (monthly vs annual).
steps.businessRationale: Fast, accurate recalculation is essential; slow or inconsistent pricing reduces trust and conversion. This step produces the 'renewal price shown' event tied to revenue.

steps.description: Customer accepts renewal offer, selects payment method (one-off or instalments), payment gateway authorises transaction, Policy Administration System (PAS) records renewal and issues new policy term.
steps.businessRationale: Payment success is the primary revenue event for renewals. Failures or long latency cause immediate revenue loss and increase churn risk. Policy bind must be atomic and auditable.

steps.description: Generate renewed policy documents (Buildings/Contents/Combined SKU), send e-policy PDF and renewal receipt by email, update customer portal, trigger post-renewal cross-sell and NPS survey workflows.
steps.businessRationale: Timely document delivery reduces support contacts and confirms revenue recognition; onboarding workflows drive cross-sell and retention metrics.
